backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining task, user, payout types and state, with admin-only queries for dashboard stats, payout listing, and payout status updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing deployment-related files, components, and requirement mapping.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining color variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting metadata and favicon.
frontend/README.md: Frontend README outlining features, tech stack, and development setup for the Xtask app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup using TanStack Router, defining all user and admin routes with layout and auth guards.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard that checks admin status and redirects unauthorized users to the access denied page.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Authenticated layout wrapper with top header, bottom nav, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate handling login, loading states, and onboarding flow before showing protected content.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar for main sections with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass-style card wrapper providing blurred, translucent UI styling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/TaskSubmissionFo: Form to submit task completion proof with validation and placeholder backend logic.
frontend/src/components/TextLogo.tsx: Simple component rendering the XTask text logo.
frontend/src/components/TopHeader.tsx: Top navigation header with logo, notifications, and support links.
frontend/src/deployInfo.ts: Build-time deployment metadata loader for canister IDs and site URL.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminDashb: Fetches admin dashboard statistics via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPayou: Fetches all payout requests and provides mutation to update their status.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminStatu: Checks whether the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerProf: Retrieves and saves the current caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTasks.ts: Fetches tasks periodically and provides a mutation to create new tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an about page showing platform details, deployment info, supported features, and limitations.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Displays an access denied message with a button redirecting users to the dashboard.
Shows admin statistics such as users, earnings, tasks, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin panel layout with navigation sidebar and header, wrapping all admin pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPayouts.ts: Displays payout requests for admins with controls to approve or decline and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupport.ts: Static admin page showing an empty support tickets placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTasks.tsx: Allows admins to create new tasks and view the task list with form handling and validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminUsers.tsx: Placeholder admin page for future user management features.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Shows user earnings, task stats, and referral info, with loading states and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Public landing page with hero content and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Provides a notifications page placeholder with no current notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Handles initial user profile creation with name and optional referral code.
frontend/src/pages/Payout.tsx: Displays payout balance, minimum withdrawal info, and placeholders for payout methods and history.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shows user profile details, referral info, and links to settings and login/logout actions.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Support page placeholder indicating upcoming ticketing system.
frontend/src/pages/SupportThread.tsx: Placeholder page for viewing individual support threads.
frontend/src/pages/TaskDetails.tsx: Displays a single task’s details, status, reward, and submission form or review/completed messages depending on state.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Lists all tasks with status, reward, descriptions, and navigation to individual task details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL-based state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, layout settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s scope, constraints, features, and architectural notes for an Internet Computer–based web app using React and Motoko.
